page.title: 08St Edeyrn Church
page.content: St Edeyrn's C/W,Church Road,Llanedyrn is in the Rectorial Benefice of Cyncoed. The rector since march 1984 is Canon John Woodward,J.P.,B.A. assisted by three clergymen, a clergy- woman and two lay ministers.Services held are Holy Eucarist on the 2nd and 4th Sundays and Matins on the 5th Sunday of each month and Evensong twice a month. On average 15 weddings, 5 funerals and 40 christenings are held throughout the year and about 40 people attend services regularly from the whole of the Benefice.There is no choir but two congregation members share the playing of the church organ while another chimes the four bells before services and after weddings. Church members help maintain,clean and decorate the church.Although locked when unattended,the church has many visitors and tenders of graves.
